content:
Scenario: Household safety modifications for aging in place
    Given Margaret wants to continue living independently
    And aging may require household modifications
    When the household_elohim assesses safety needs
    Then it should identify potential safety hazards
    And it should suggest affordable modifications
    And it should connect Margaret to assistance programs
    And modifications should support long-term independence
    And Margaret should be able to age safely at home
    And proactive planning should prevent crisis
